ygData.subject: Re: help with froglok
ygData.msgSnippet: For the page, you will need to leave the town of gukta and right outside there should be what looks like a little bag on the ground. That should be the page
ygData.messageBody:
For the page, you will need to leave the town of gukta and right
outside there should be what looks like a little bag on the ground.
That should be the page that you need.

You can check allakazahm to get the exact /loc (I'm at work so I
can't check that right now)

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "justin" <pavisoj@q...> wrote:
> i jsut started a froglok and am now stuck i went to the
loremaster pit hailed rutka jrajek like ai am asupposed to but all
he says is something about a lost page where do i find it and what
am i supposed to do the progress check says i have not talked to
rutka jrajek even thought i have. I need hekpo please thak you
>
> Gronan
> 2nd level Shaman Froglok
